name: Wrath of Bolas: The Life of a Cube in a Spherical World
name_original: Wrath of Bolas: The Life of a Cube in a Spherical World
description:
Control Cubo as he tries to survive the Bolas hatred for edges in a forever-lasting game of cat and mouse. Use the bombs scattered around the map to slow down the reproduction of Bolas and use your shifting ability to go invincible when you're in a tight spot!

Be careful, if same colored Bolas collide, they pop out a new Bola into this world... Things can become chaotic quite fast.

This game is part of Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2 and is my first game ever. Hope you enjoy and I would love to have feedback on general game design!

Post your high score and see if you can beat mine of 45 seconds.
